content:
The Ukrainian military is used by the means of radio electronic struggle to stop Russian attacks. Often, Russian drones can be landed intact.

About thisstatedA spokesman for the Armed Forces of Ukraine Major Ilya Yevlash on the air of the Telernado "One News".

"Yes, to some extent, we constantly apply them in the fight against shock -free Shahaned drones and also against rockets that drive them crazy, if you can say so," missiles are not gone, "Elijah said.

He added that with the help of radio electronic struggle, Russian drones can be stored intact. And this makes it possible to study them, to study their technical characteristics and features of the design.

According to Elijah Yevlash, so without the use of expensive missiles, our military manages to land quite dangerous goals.

It will be recalled that on April 1, the Armed Forces of Ukraineknocked downRussian drone worth almost $ 7 million.
title: Reb against rockets and shock drones: in the air forces told how Russian attacks stop
description: This was stated by a spokesman for the Armed Forces of Ukraine Major Ilya Yevlash on air ...
author: Army Inform
